overview: When young Max accepts a job working as a personal assistant for his hero, Pulitzer Prize winning author and professor Dr. Daniel Gray, it seems like a dream come true...until Max arrives at Dr. Grey's summer house and meets Mrs. Grey, his stunning TS wife. Max's dream job becomes a nightmare when he realizes that his boss is a malignant narcissist and his wife has taken an inappropriate interest in her husband's new employee...
title: TS Taboo 2  - My Boss' Wife
